channel.title: NPR Topics: News
channel.description: NPR news, audio, and podcasts. Coverage of breaking stories, national and world news, politics, business, science, technology, and extended coverage of major national and world events.
channel.copyright: Copyright 2024 NPR - For Personal Use Only

item.title: Harris calls herself an underdog with momentum during a fundraiser speech
item.description: In her speech, Vice President Harris spoke boldly about the stakes of the presidential election, and brushed off Donald Trump's latest attacks against her.
item.content:encoded:
In her speech, Vice President Harris spoke boldly about the stakes of the presidential election, and brushed off Donald Trump's latest attacks against her.

(Image credit: Stephanie Scarbrough)
item.dc:creator: Tamara Keith

item.title: A rocket hit Israeli-controlled Golan Heights, after Israel struck a Gaza school
item.description: A rocket has hit a sports complex filled with children playing soccer in the Israeli-controlled Golan Heights region Saturday afternoon, on the same day that an Israeli strike in Gaza devastated a school building and killed dozens.
item.content:encoded:
A rocket has hit a sports complex filled with children playing soccer in the Israeli-controlled Golan Heights region Saturday afternoon, on the same day that an Israeli strike in Gaza devastated a school building and killed dozens.

(Image credit: Jalaa Marey)
item.dc:creator: Willem Marx

item.title: Swimmers score first Paris gold for U.S. in men's relay final
item.description: On a day when Australians often bested the U.S. in the swimming pool at the Paris Summer Olympics, four Americans seized gold from the Aussies in the men's 4x100-meter freestyle relay.
item.content:encoded:
On a day when Australians often bested the U.S. in the swimming pool at the Paris Summer Olympics, four Americans seized gold from the Aussies in the men's 4x100-meter freestyle relay.

(Image credit: Martin Meissner)
item.dc:creator: Brian Mann

item.title: FIFA suspends Canada's women's soccer coach for one year after Olympic spying scandal
item.description: Coach Bev Priestman and two former members of Canada's coaching staff cannot work in soccer for a year. In addition, the Canadian women's team received a penalty that likely ends its Olympic hopes.
item.content:encoded:
Coach Bev Priestman and two former members of Canada's coaching staff cannot work in soccer for a year. In addition, the Canadian women's team received a penalty that likely ends its Olympic hopes.

(Image credit: Arnaud Finistre)
item.dc:creator: Becky Sullivan

item.title: Gamblers bet millions on Kamala Harris's VP pick
item.description: Gamblers have wagered hundreds of millions of dollars on who Vice President Kamala Harris will choose as her running mate.
item.content:encoded: Gamblers have wagered hundreds of millions of dollars on who Vice President Kamala Harris will choose as her running mate.
item.dc:creator: Avery Keatley

item.title: A year after her speakership ending, Nancy Pelosiâ€™s influence remains strong
item.description: Former House Speaker Nancy Pelosi has had a historic career. Even after she stepped aside from party leadership, her influence remains strong.
item.content:encoded: Former House Speaker Nancy Pelosi has had a historic career. Even after she stepped aside from party leadership, her influence remains strong.
item.dc:creator: Susan Davis

item.title: How an abandoned baby owl was rescued in a warm tortilla
item.description: When a Texas resident found an abandoned baby owl at a family barbecue, she acted fast to rescue it -- using a warm tortilla.
item.content:encoded: When a Texas resident found an abandoned baby owl at a family barbecue, she acted fast to rescue it -- using a warm tortilla.
item.dc:creator: Gabriel Sanchez

item.title: Children were main casualties in strikes in Gaza and near Israel's Northern border
item.description: An Israeli airstrike hit yet another school sheltering displaced people in Gaza. Later, a rocket strike in the Israeli-controlled Golan Heights hit a soccer field where kids were playing.
item.content:encoded: An Israeli airstrike hit yet another school sheltering displaced people in Gaza. Later, a rocket strike in the Israeli-controlled Golan Heights hit a soccer field where kids were playing.
item.dc:creator: Kat Lonsdorf

item.title: After opening ceremony, Paris Olympics are really getting started
item.description: With the opening ceremony wrapped up, the competition at the Paris Olympics really gets underway. On Saturday, among the notable events are some swimming finals and men's gymnastics preliminaries.
item.content:encoded: With the opening ceremony wrapped up, the competition at the Paris Olympics really gets underway. On Saturday, among the notable events are some swimming finals and men's gymnastics preliminaries.
item.dc:creator: Scott Detrow

item.title: Rocket attack on Israeli-controlled Golan Heights kills 10, rescue official says
item.description: A attack on a soccer field in the Israeli-controlled Golan Heights wounded several other people hours after an Israeli airstrike on south Lebanon killed three members of Hezbollah.
item.content:encoded: A attack on a soccer field in the Israeli-controlled Golan Heights wounded several other people hours after an Israeli airstrike on south Lebanon killed three members of Hezbollah.
item.dc:creator: The Associated Press
